text: Devil May Cry 5 is the sixth video game in the series of Devil May Cry. It was released on the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on 2019. ==Gameplay== Players can play as Dante, Nero and V, each with their own movesets. ==Development== The game started as sales for DmC: Devil May Cry weren't good enough. ==Special Edition== For 2020, the game has a Special Edition that allows Vergil as a playable character as well as next-generation console upgrades. ==Reception== The game was well-liked and considered one of the best Devil May Cry games as well as a return to form. title: Devil May Cry 5
